title: Red ensign
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional, Jerome Jackson and Michael Powell
brief_description: This is the story of David Barr, a shipbuilder, who fights to keep the shipyards open during the Depression of the 1930’s. David Barr fights the cautious businessman, Lord Dean, both for the affection of the heiress, June MacKinnon, and for the use of her money to finance his construction program. Stars Leslie Banks, Carol Goodner, Alfred Drayton, Frank Vosper.
